多行文本合并/多行文本合并_0003.jpg.mt:
Core Technology Three Highlights  

"Artificial Muscle" Material Application  
SORBOTHANE, with its remarkable shock absorption and pressure dispersion abilities, is known as artificial muscle.  

Transverse Arch Support  
Three arched structures enhance the propulsion function of the foot, making walking easier.  

Refreshing and Breathable  
Cooling surface layer, unidirectional moisture conduction, making feet feel more comfortable.
src: 核心技术 三大亮点
“人工肌肉”材料应用
SORBOTHANE因具有惊人的冲击吸收和压力分散性能被誉为人工肌肉
足弓横弓支撑
3个拱形支撑，提高了脚趾的功能，使步行变得更轻松
凉爽透气
凉感表层，单向导湿，脚感更舒适

多行文本合并/多行文本合并_0011.jpg.mt:
Multiple Color Customization

Choose from a variety of preferred colors. Frame, headboard, and bedside table available in two different colors. For more details, please contact our customer service team.

● Vintage Black   
Rubberwood Frame / Eco-friendly Oil Paint

● Walnut Color   
Rubberwood Frame / Eco-friendly Oil Paint
src: 多个颜色可定制
多看几眼会更喜欢，框架、床头柜各两种颜色可选，想了解具体详情的宝子，记得戳客服小姐姐哦
复古黑色
橡胶木框架/环保油漆
胡桃木色

多行文本合并/多行文本合并_0031.jpg.mt:
**A healthy choice, a household essential**  
**Naturally emitting wood fragrance**  
Camphor wood is mildly warm and non-toxic, with a pleasant fragrance.  
It is a valuable protective item for clothing, books, and documents.
src: 健康之选 居家必备
散发自然木香
香樟木性微温无毒，有馨香气味是衣物书籍档案的防护珍品

多行文本合并/多行文本合并_0044.jpg.mt:
Certified Apple 【Official MFi Certification】  
High-Quality Fast Charging Original Certification to Protect Your Device  

Undergoes strict testing by Apple, Green Union promises that all Apple fast charging cables sold have MFi certification. Certification can be checked online for guaranteed safety, better battery longevity, and durability.  

Apple Official MFi Certification  
- Professional and stable fast charging  
- Preserves battery lifespan  

Non-official Certification  
✘ Unstable charging and slower speed  
✘ Battery capacity deteriorates easily  

PS: MFi certification refers to cables with data transmission capabilities certified through MFi.
src: 认准苹果【MFi官方认证】
高品质快充 原配认证才护机
经过苹果公司多项严苛检测，绿联承诺
所有售卖的苹果快充线均有MFi认证，官网可查询
安全有保障，电池更耐用
苹果官方MFi认证
非官方认证
专业稳定快充
弹窗不稳耗电快
保护电池寿命
电池容易老损
PS：MFi认证指套餐搭配数据线经过MFi认证

多行文本合并/多行文本合并_0058.jpg.mt:
French Perfume Master Calice  
Inspirational Creation  

Redefining the 2024 Trendy Fragrance  

"In the dawn of May in the small town of Grasse,  
the precious silky oud wood intertwines with the delicate floral notes of Grasse roses and dreamy lavender.  
I use invisible aromatic structures to craft fragrances with great appeal,  
allowing the charm of scents to become more perceptible from this moment onward."  

Calice  
True Creator of Fragrance  

President of the International Society of Perfumers  
Head of the Grasse School of Perfumery
src: 法国香水大师Calice
灵感创香
重新定义2024年度潮流香氛
五月格拉斯小镇的晨曦中
珍稀丝绒乌木之息与梦幻格拉斯玫瑰花香交织
我用无形的香氛成就穿香者极致魅力
让香氛从此可感更可见
真我香水创作者
国际调香师理事会联席主席
奇华顿法国调香师学校校长
